title: Tiger Team
overview: In the military the elite forces used to test defenses are known as tiger teams. The show follows a civilian tiger team composed of Chris Nickerson, Luke McOmie and Ryan Jones, who are hired to infiltrate organizations with the objective of testing their weaknesses to electronic, psychological, tactical, and physical threats. Attacks executed on organizations in this television show include social engineering, wired and wireless hacking, and physically breaking into buildings.
